pages.title: Gray Whale
pages.text: The common name of the whale comes from the gray patches and white mottling on its dark skin.$(br2)Gray whales were once called devil fish because of their fighting behavior when hunted.$(br2)The gray whale is the sole living species in the genus Eschrichtius.

pages.title: Gray Whale
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
